Rowdy Wolf:




The strange metalic wolf turned its gruesom head to KitKat, then turned back 
to Stingtra, who was closest to Quickstrike. It wanted him. Perhaps to kill 
him. It snarled and took a step closer. Its pawless legs stepped harshly on 
the ground.

Rowdy Wolf howled and transformed to robot mode. "Leave him alone!" he 
called out. He withdrew his rifle and aimed it at the Metal Beast. "Go get 
him out of here! I'll deal with this! Go!" He threw his arm out.

He fired a shot into the Beast's shoulder, below its cannon.

Above, Terrorsaur circled nervously.
